ChatterAnswersActivity.name: ChatterAnswersActivity
ChatterAnswersActivity.description: Represents the reputation of a User in Chatter Answers zones.

BestAnswerReceivedCount.description: The number of best answers the User has received from other users.

BestAnswerSelectedCount.description: The number of best answers the User has selected.

QuestionsCount.description: The number of Question records posted by the User.

QuestionSubscrCount.description: The number of Question records the User has selected to follow.

QuestionSubscrReceivedCount.description: The number of users following Question records posted by the User.

QuestionUpVotesCount.description: The number of up votes the User has marked on Question records posted by other users.

QuestionUpVotesReceivedCount.description: The number of up votes the User has received from other users on the Question records he or she has posted.

RepliesCount.description: The number of Reply records posted by the User.

ReplyDownVotesCount.description: The number of down votes the User has marked on Reply records posted by other users.

ReplyDownVotesReceivedCount.description: The number of down votes the User has received from other users on the Reply records he or she has posted.

ReplyUpVotesCount.description: The number of up votes the User has marked on the Reply records posted by other users.

ReplyUpVotesReceivedCount.description: The number of up votes the User has received from other users on the Reply records he or she has posted.

ReportAbuseOnQuestionsCount.description: The number of abuses that the User has reported on Question records posted by other users.

ReportAbuseOnRepliesCount.description: The number of abuses that the User has reported on Reply records posted by other users.

ReportAbuseReceivedOnQnCount.description: The number of abuses reported by other users on the Question records posted by the User.

ReportAbuseReceivedOnReCount.description: the number of abuses reported by other users on the Reply records posted by the User.

UserId.description: The User ID associated with this reputation.

CommunityId.description: The ID for the zone associated with this reputation.
